terminologie_extrait.definition: to make your shots natural and automatic
terminologie_extrait.contexte: during warm-up to prepare for matches

debutant.description: Do some easy jogging and perhaps some shadow practice to warm up the muscles.

intermediaire.description: Arrange in advance to warm up with someone you are used to practicing with.
Decide in advance what you need to warm up and make sure to cover every major aspect of your game.

exercices_complementaires.description: To warm up the muscles and get ready to play.

metriques_progression.description: Take 2-3 minutes or more to warm up each major aspect of your game.
For a really good warm-up, it takes at least 45 minutes or more, though you can probably get most of it done in 30 minutes.

erreurs_a_eviter.description: Don't forget to play actual points after warming up.
Make sure to feel ready to play after the warm-up.
